operationBinding.selectClause: t.contract_id, t.block, t.critical_number, t.deleted, t.end_date, t.is_budget, t.main_detail_id, t.main_id, t.note, t.price, t.price_type, t.rec_date, t.rec_user, t.sms_warning, t.start_date, t.upd_date, t.upd_user, t.phone_list_type, t.range_curr_price, mo1.org_name as orgName, md.main_detail_geo as orgDepName, decode(t.price_type,0,'მარტ.','რთული') as price_type_descr
operationBinding.tableClause: ccare.contracts t, ccare.main_orgs mo1, ccare.main_details md
operationBinding.whereClause: t.main_id = mo1.main_id and t.main_detail_id = md.main_detail_id (+) and t.deleted = 0 #if($criteria.org_name1) and mo1.org_name like '%'||($criteria.org_name1)||'%' #end #if($criteria.org_name2) and mo1.org_name like '%'||($criteria.org_name2)||'%' #end #if($criteria.org_name3) and mo1.org_name like '%'||($criteria.org_name3)||'%' #end #if($criteria.org_name4) and mo1.org_name like '%'||($criteria.org_name4)||'%' #end #if($criteria.org_name5) and mo1.org_name like '%'||($criteria.org_name5)||'%' #end #if($criteria.org_name6) and mo1.org_name like '%'||($criteria.org_name6)||'%' #end #if($criteria.org_name7) and mo1.org_name like '%'||($criteria.org_name7)||'%' #end #if($criteria.org_name8) and mo1.org_name like '%'||($criteria.org_name8)||'%' #end #if($criteria.org_name9) and mo1.org_name like '%'||($criteria.org_name9)||'%' #end #if($criteria.orgDepName1) and md.main_detail_geo like '%'||($criteria.orgDepName1)||'%' #end #if($criteria.orgDepName2) and md.main_detail_geo like '%'||($criteria.orgDepName2)||'%' #end #if($criteria.orgDepName3) and md.main_detail_geo like '%'||($criteria.orgDepName3)||'%' #end #if($criteria.orgDepName4) and md.main_detail_geo like '%'||($criteria.orgDepName4)||'%' #end #if($criteria.orgDepName5) and md.main_detail_geo like '%'||($criteria.orgDepName5)||'%' #end #if($criteria.is_budget) and t.is_budget = $criteria.is_budget #end #if($criteria.deleted) and t.deleted = $criteria.deleted #end #if($criteria.price_type) and t.price_type = $criteria.price_type #end #if($criteria.phone) and t.contract_id in (select tt.contract_id from ccare.contractor_phones tt where tt.phone = $criteria.phone) #end #if($criteria.limitType && $criteria.limitType == 0 ) and t.critical_number <> -999999999 #end #if($criteria.limitType && $criteria.limitType == 1 ) and t.critical_number = -999999999 #end

operationBinding.tableClause: (select /*+ index(p PHN_PRY_KS001)*/ distinct p.phone from ccare.abonents a inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where a.main_detail_id in ( select t.main_detail_id from ccare.main_details t start with t.main_detail_id = $criteria.main_detail_id and t.deleted = 0 connect by prior t.main_detail_id = t.main_detail_master_id ) and p.deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and p.phone not in ( select /*+ index(p PHN_PRY_KS001)*/ p.phone from ccare.abonents a inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where p.deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and a.main_detail_id in ( select c.main_detail_id from ccare.contracts c where c.deleted = 0 and trunc(sysdate)>=trunc(c.start_date) and trunc(sysdate) < trunc(c.end_date) and c.main_detail_id in ( select t.main_detail_id from ccare.main_details t where level>1 start with t.main_detail_id = $criteria.main_detail_id and t.deleted = 0 connect by prior t.main_detail_id = t.main_detail_master_id ) ) ) and ccare.isPhoneChargeable(p.phone) = 1 ) tt

( select /*+ index(p PHN_PRY_KS001)*/ distinct p.phone from ccare.abonents a inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where a.main_detail_id in ( select t.main_detail_id from ccare.main_details t start with t.main_detail_id = $criteria.main_detail_id and t.deleted = 0 connect by prior t.main_detail_id = t.main_detail_master_id ) and p.deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and p.phone not in ( select /*+ index(p PHN_PRY_KS001)*/ p.phone from ccare.abonents a inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where p.deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and a.main_detail_id in ( select c.main_detail_id from ccare.contracts c where c.deleted = 0 and trunc(sysdate)>=trunc(c.start_date) and trunc(sysdate)<trunc(c.end_date) and c.main_detail_id in ( select t.main_detail_id from ccare.main_details t where level>1 start with t.main_detail_id = $criteria.main_detail_id and t.deleted = 0 connect by prior t.main_detail_id = t.main_detail_master_id ) ) ) and p.phone not in ( select tt.phone from ccare.contractor_phones tt where tt.contract_id = $criteria.contract_id and tt.deleted = 0 ) and ccare.isPhoneChargeable(p.phone) = 1 ) tt

( select /*+ index(p PHN_PRY_KS001)*/ distinct p.phone from ccare.abonents a inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where a.main_detail_id in ( select t.main_detail_id from ccare.main_details t start with t.main_detail_id = $criteria.main_detail_id and t.deleted = 0 connect by prior t.main_detail_id = t.main_detail_master_id ) and p.deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and p.phone not in ( select /*+ index(p PHN_PRY_KS001)*/ p.phone from ccare.abonents a inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where p.deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and a.main_detail_id in ( select c.main_detail_id from ccare.contracts c where c.deleted = 0 and trunc(sysdate)>=trunc(c.start_date) and trunc(sysdate)<trunc(c.end_date) and c.main_detail_id in ( select t.main_detail_id from ccare.main_details t where level>1 start with t.main_detail_id = $criteria.main_detail_id and t.deleted = 0 connect by prior t.main_detail_id = t.main_detail_master_id ) ) ) and p.phone in ( select tt.phone from ccare.contractor_phones tt where tt.contract_id = $criteria.contract_id and tt.deleted = 0 ) and ccare.isPhoneChargeable(p.phone) = 1 ) tt

(select distinct p.phone from ( select ms.main_id from ccare.main_services ms start with ms.main_id = $criteria.main_id and ms.service_id = 3 connect by prior ms.main_id = ms.main_master_id) r inner join ccare.abonents a on a.main_id = r.main_id inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where p. deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and p.phone not in ( select p.phone from ( select t.main_id from ccare.main_services t start with t.main_id in ( select c.main_id from ccare.contracts c where c.deleted = 0 and trunc(sysdate)>=trunc(c.start_date) and trunc(sysdate)<trunc(c.end_date) and c.main_id in ( select t.main_id from ccare.main_services t where level>1 start with t.main_id = $criteria.main_id and t.service_id = 3 connect by prior t.main_id = t.main_master_id ) and (c.main_detail_id is null or c.main_detail_id = 0) ) and t.service_id = 3 connect by prior t.main_id = t.main_master_id ) a1 inner join ccare.abonents a on a.main_id = a1.main_id inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where a.deleted = 0 and p.deleted = 0 ) and p.phone not in ( select /*+ index(p PHN_PRY_KS001)*/ p.phone from ccare.abonents a inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where p.deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and a.main_detail_id in (select t.main_detail_id from ccare.main_details t start with t.main_detail_id in (select c.main_detail_id from ccare.contracts c where c.deleted = 0 and trunc(sysdate)>=trunc(c.start_date) and trunc(sysdate)<trunc(c.end_date) and c.main_id in (select t.main_id from ccare.main_services t where level>1 start with t.main_id = $criteria.main_id and t.service_id = 3 connect by prior t.main_id = t.main_master_id ) and (c.main_detail_id is not null and c.main_detail_id <> 0) ) and t.deleted = 0 connect by prior t.main_detail_id = t.main_detail_master_id) ) and ccare.isPhoneChargeable(p.phone) = 1 ) tt

(select distinct p.phone from ( select ms.main_id from ccare.main_services ms start with ms.main_id = $criteria.main_id and ms.service_id = 3 connect by prior ms.main_id = ms.main_master_id) r inner join ccare.abonents a on a.main_id = r.main_id inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where p. deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and p.phone not in ( select p.phone from ( select t.main_id from ccare.main_services t start with t.main_id in ( select c.main_id from ccare.contracts c where c.deleted = 0 and trunc(sysdate)>=trunc(c.start_date) and trunc(sysdate)<trunc(c.end_date) and c.main_id in ( select t.main_id from ccare.main_services t where level>1 start with t.main_id = $criteria.main_id and t.service_id = 3 connect by prior t.main_id = t.main_master_id ) and (c.main_detail_id is null or c.main_detail_id = 0) ) and t.service_id = 3 connect by prior t.main_id = t.main_master_id ) a1 inner join ccare.abonents a on a.main_id = a1.main_id inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where a.deleted = 0 and p.deleted = 0 ) and p.phone not in ( select /*+ index(p PHN_PRY_KS001)*/ p.phone from ccare.abonents a inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where p.deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and a.main_detail_id in (select t.main_detail_id from ccare.main_details t start with t.main_detail_id in (select c.main_detail_id from ccare.contracts c where c.deleted = 0 and trunc(sysdate)>=trunc(c.start_date) and trunc(sysdate)<trunc(c.end_date) and c.main_id in (select t.main_id from ccare.main_services t where level>1 start with t.main_id = $criteria.main_id and t.service_id = 3 connect by prior t.main_id = t.main_master_id ) and (c.main_detail_id is not null and c.main_detail_id <> 0) ) and t.deleted = 0 connect by prior t.main_detail_id = t.main_detail_master_id) ) and p.phone not in ( select tt.phone from ccare.contractor_phones tt where tt.contract_id = $criteria.contract_id and tt.deleted = 0 ) and ccare.isPhoneChargeable(p.phone) = 1 ) tt

(select distinct p.phone from ( select ms.main_id from ccare.main_services ms start with ms.main_id = $criteria.main_id and ms.service_id = 3 connect by prior ms.main_id = ms.main_master_id) r inner join ccare.abonents a on a.main_id = r.main_id inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where p. deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and p.phone not in ( select p.phone from ( select t.main_id from ccare.main_services t start with t.main_id in ( select c.main_id from ccare.contracts c where c.deleted = 0 and trunc(sysdate)>=trunc(c.start_date) and trunc(sysdate)<trunc(c.end_date) and c.main_id in ( select t.main_id from ccare.main_services t where level>1 start with t.main_id = $criteria.main_id and t.service_id = 3 connect by prior t.main_id = t.main_master_id ) and (c.main_detail_id is null or c.main_detail_id = 0) ) and t.service_id = 3 connect by prior t.main_id = t.main_master_id ) a1 inner join ccare.abonents a on a.main_id = a1.main_id inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where a.deleted = 0 and p.deleted = 0 ) and p.phone not in ( select /*+ index(p PHN_PRY_KS001)*/ p.phone from ccare.abonents a inner join ccare.phones p on p.phone_id = a.phone_id where p.deleted = 0 and a.deleted = 0 and a.main_detail_id in (select t.main_detail_id from ccare.main_details t start with t.main_detail_id in (select c.main_detail_id from ccare.contracts c where c.deleted = 0 and trunc(sysdate)>=trunc(c.start_date) and trunc(sysdate)<trunc(c.end_date) and c.main_id in (select t.main_id from ccare.main_services t where level>1 start with t.main_id = $criteria.main_id and t.service_id = 3 connect by prior t.main_id = t.main_master_id ) and (c.main_detail_id is not null and c.main_detail_id <> 0) ) and t.deleted = 0 connect by prior t.main_detail_id = t.main_detail_master_id) ) and p.phone in ( select tt.phone from ccare.contractor_phones tt where tt.contract_id = $criteria.contract_id and tt.deleted = 0 ) and ccare.isPhoneChargeable(p.phone) = 1 ) tt

operationBinding.selectClause: mo.org_name as orgName, md.main_detail_geo as orgDepName, t.call_count, t.price, t.amount
operationBinding.tableClause: ccare.contractor_bill t, ccare.contracts c, ccare.main_orgs mo, ccare.main_details md
operationBinding.whereClause: t.contractor_id = c.contract_id and c.main_id = mo.main_id and c.main_detail_id = md.main_detail_id(+) and t.ym = $criteria.ym #if($criteria.contract_id) and c.contract_id = $criteria.contract_id #end #if($criteria.is_budget) and c.is_budget = $criteria.is_budget #end

operationBinding.selectClause: tc.billing_company_name, mo.org_name as orgName, md.main_detail_geo as orgDepName, s.service_name_geo, bi.phone, bi.call_date, bi.charge_date, bi.price
operationBinding.tableClause: ccare.contractor_bill_items bi, ccare.contracts c, ccare.main_orgs mo, ccare.main_details md, ccare.tel_comps tc, ccare.services s
operationBinding.whereClause: bi.contractor_id = c.contract_id and c.main_id = mo.main_id and c.main_detail_id = md.main_detail_id(+) and bi.billing_company_id = tc.billing_company_id and bi.service_id = s.service_id and bi.ym = $criteria.ym #if($criteria.contract_id) and c.contract_id = $criteria.contract_id #end #if($criteria.is_budget) and c.is_budget = $criteria.is_budget #end
operationBinding.orderClause: tc.billing_company_name, mo.org_name, md.main_detail_geo, bi.phone, s.service_name_geo, bi.call_date, bi.charge_date
